wizaRd
=====

Spell data taken from https://github.com/thebombzen/grimoire, originally https://github.com/ephe/grimoire/.

Installation
----------

```
devtools::install_github('oganm/ogbox')
devtools::install_github('oganm/wizaRd')
```

Usage
-----

```{r}
spells$Immolation
```
